entry.title: Current Conditions: Partly Cloudy, 4.9°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 5:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

Temperature: 4.9°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.9 kPa rising
Visibility: 24.1 km
Humidity: 61 %
Dewpoint: -2.1°C

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then snow beginning before morning. Risk of freezing rain before morning. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 2. Wind chill minus 5 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. Temperature steady near zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow. Risk of freezing rain in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 3 in the morning. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Monday 26 December 2022
